enhanced_description: PT. Galiba Dayamitra Utama, established on 2nd December, 2002 through ministerial decree, is an HR management and business consulting company specializing in engineering and business outsourcing. The company focuses on meeting client requirements by offering diverse field services, sales distribution support, and leveraging Big Data and Machine Learning capabilities. Their core offerings include comprehensive human resources services (talent acquisition, leadership development, workforce planning), finance and tax services (accounting, financial reporting, auditor liaison, and tax compliance), and business consulting that integrates industry, strategy, operations, and financial expertise. Galiba aims to help clients fill open positions more quickly and achieve a strategic position in managing talent.
competitive_advantages: Established presence since 2002 (over two decades of experience)
Leverages Big Data and Machine Learning for service delivery
Offers a comprehensive suite of services (one-stop shop for HR, Finance, and Business functions)
Strategic approach to HR management (talent acquisition, leadership development, workforce planning)
Ability to serve large and global enterprises
roi_benefits: Faster time to fill open positions
Enhanced compliance through tax and financial reporting services
Potential cost efficiencies through outsourcing core functions
